title: On Ibram Kendi: A Perspective by Rebecca Christiansen
description:
I speak with Rebecca about an article she recently wrote about the book "How to be an Antiracist" by Ibram X Kendi. By the title of the article, you can see that Rebecca is advocating for actually reading the source material rather than making judgements based on quotes pulled out of context. You may still disagree with the material post read...but at least you will be well informed in that disagreement 

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/On-Ibram-Kendi-A-Perspective-by-Rebecca-Christiansen-ev8kd1

Rebecca's article: https://girlchild.substack.com/p/in-defence-of-reading-the-damn-book

Link to her substack: https://girlchild.substack.com

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
